amendment.description: To ensure adequate funding for, and the continuation of activities related to, the treatment by the Department of Energy of high level radioactive waste.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3261 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 48 - 48. Record Vote Number: 107.

action.text: Amendment SA 3261 proposed by Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S6395-6421; text: CR S6395-6396) To ensure adequate funding for, and the continuation of activities related to, the treatment by the Department of Energy of high level radioactive waste.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3261 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 48 - 48. Record Vote Number: 107.
